main event: A military observer reported a possible satellite appearing as a shooting star observed for 15 seconds.
interesting points: The observation was made on May 22, 1963, at specific coordinates in the Pacific,The object was observed at a course of 135-360 degrees true and 50 degrees elevation,General description and duration were more consistent with a meteor observation,The observation lasted for 15 seconds, The report is part of the Project Blue Book documentation on UFO sightings.
sighted object: possibly a satellite appearing as a shooting star
